name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Developer with 13+ years of experience in crafting high-performance applications using the **MERN stack**. Proficient in **Node.js**, **Express.js**, **ReactJS**, **Redux**, and **TypeScript**, demonstrating strong capabilities in frontend and backend development. Expert in employing **RabbitMQ** and **Redis** for effective data handling and messaging in scalable applications. Adept at ensuring high-quality code through testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Mocha**, and maintaining code versioning using **Git** and **GitLab** while effectively tracking project progress with **Jira**.

Skilled in UI/UX design, creating intuitive interfaces while ensuring a seamless user experience. Experienced in integrating **Social Network APIs** to enhance application functionality.  Additionally, I leverage **Styled Components** for efficient styling and theming.

Strong background in healthcare and financial industries with proficiency in building AI/ML-powered platforms, deploying cloud-native systems on AWS and Azure, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
